a.title: Permalink to Meals During School Closure Available

div.class: post-4377 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-headlines odd

div.p: A grab and go free lunch (and a breakfast for the following day) will be served to children 0 to 18 starting Monday, March 16th. This will take place at the Vermillion Middle School from 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. on Monday through Friday until the regular school day resumes. If you have any questions, please call 677-7000.

div.a: High School Students to Perform at Poetry Contest
